objects.pattern: [process:command_line MATCHES '^.+>-add GlobalSign.cer -c -s -r localMachine Root$' AND process:image_ref.name = 'foo.c'] OR [process:command_line MATCHES'^.+>-add GlobalSign.cer -c -s -r localMachineTrustedPublisher$'] OR [process:opened_connection_refs[*].src_port = '25'] OR [process:opened_connection_refs[*].src_ref.value = '0.0.0.0']
